title: Updating Terms of Reference for Mosul Trip

user_voice_extracts.text: This was my TOR for my first trip to Mosul, I need to modify it for my second trip which will be bringing together the people from the first sustainability meetup and go over the curriculum I've been developing since then and validating it with them. I also would like to spend some time with local industry/academic experts to further develop the training and potentially document their expertise for use in the curriculum either with worksheets/materials/video recordings. can you help me modify the TOR for this purpose? I want to go october 20 to november 5
user_voice_extracts.source_attachment: paste.txt (5302 chars) - Original TOR from first Mosul trip with request for modifications

user_voice_extracts.text:
Modify the schedule below to respond to the following comment, ask me 3 questions to get the updates right:

Comment: "Hi Bilal, In order to submit a TR in the system, we will need a detailed list of activities for each day to be included in the ToR for the TR approval. Could you please ensure that all meetings are listed and specify the locations of the events, along with the estimated number of hours for each?"

[followed by detailed schedule with specific dates, activities, overnight locations]
reveals: willingness to ask for clarification before proceeding

user_voice_extracts.text: We will hold the meetings in Erbil at the Kesk offices and at the Lafarge Offices in Suleimaniyyah. In Mosul we will hold it at the same venue where the Sustainability and Reconstruction Meetup happened: Mosul Space. We will start around 11am and end at 2:30pm with a short break in between for snacks at 12:30
reveals: continuity with previous work (referencing first meetup venue)
structured time management (specific hours with breaks)
partnership awareness (naming specific venues and organizations)

quotable_quotes.significance: Encapsulates Bilal's approach: participatory validation, expertise documentation, and practical implementation through multiple formats (worksheets, materials, video). Shows commitment to co-creation and knowledge capture.

quotable_quotes.quote: In order to submit a TR in the system, we will need a detailed list of activities for each day to be included in the ToR for the TR approval. Could you please ensure that all meetings are listed and specify the locations of the events, along with the estimated number of hours for each?
quotable_quotes.context: Institutional requirement feedback that Bilal is responding to
quotable_quotes.significance: Shows Bilal's awareness of operating within institutional constraints while maintaining grassroots engagement. Demonstrates balance between formal requirements and practical implementation.
